title: RedParts
description: RedParts is a modern and fully responsive portfolio website designed to showcase personal skills, projects, and educational background with smooth animations and clean UI components.
challengingPart: The most challenging part was implementing smooth scroll animations and transitions using Framer Motion while maintaining performance and responsiveness across all devices.

title: EcoBazar
description: EcoBazar is a clean and minimal e-commerce landing page showcasing featured products, deals, and categories with an eye-catching layout built using Tailwind CSS.
challengingPart: The main challenge was creating a flexible and fully responsive grid layout that looks balanced across different screen sizes.

title: Donation
description: Donation is an interactive web app that allows users to donate to various causes and categories, showing real-time updates and total contributions dynamically.
challengingPart: The most challenging part was building a real-time donation counter and filter system using JavaScript to update data dynamically without reloading the page.

title: Medifit
description: Medifit is a modern health and fitness website design featuring sections for training programs, expert doctors, and health consultation. It focuses on visual balance and user-friendly layouts.
challengingPart: Creating elegant hover animations and perfect section alignment purely with CSS (without JavaScript) was the most challenging part.

title: BookShelf
description: BookShelf is an interactive blogging platform where users can write, read, and delete posts. It includes markdown support and stores data using local storage.
challengingPart: The most challenging part was integrating the markdown parser and managing post data efficiently in local storage.
